about_the_game:
In a world where information is the most valuable asset, your mission is to obtain data that could change the course of scientific progress and shape the future. By taking control of a miniature cockroach, you’ll infiltrate restricted areas, bypass security systems, and face unexpected challenges.

Key Features:

  • Unique Gameplay: Take control of a cockroach and experience what it’s like to be the smallest yet most crucial agent.

  • Stealth and Strategy: Your tiny size is both an advantage and a limitation. Use it wisely.

  • Engaging Storyline: Immerse yourself in a thrilling narrative where no choice is ever simple.

  • Puzzles and Secrets: Pay close attention to details and use your wits to overcome traps and uncover hidden truths.

Are you ready for a mission where your eyes, ears, and legs belong to a tiny spy?

name: IntelRoach

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (32-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K или AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K или AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 / RTX 2080 или AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 MB available space

short_description: A spy mission with an unusual agent - a cockroach - awaits you! Infiltrate the scientist's house, bypass guards, hack into systems and solve puzzles. But be careful: you're just a small insect. Are you ready to become the most stealthy spy ever?
